text: A very small underground shopping center at myeongdong station. Nothing much as compared to Seomyeon underground shopping center in Busan. Don't need to make the effort to come here to shop.
It's near the station , you wouldn't miss it , it's not much store here , not that long .. mostly Korean things like Kpop, clothes and etc . Just stroll pass ..
Right by the subway station. There a lot of shopping at good prices. Souvenirs and hand made crafts.
